portrait_l.name: roche
portrait_l.sjis: ウワサのアカバネをたおしたそうね すごいわ
portrait_l.ascii: You defeated Red Wing! That's amazing!

portrait_l.name: roche
portrait_l.sjis: わたしも好きになっちゃいそう
portrait_l.ascii: I might be falling for you too.

portrait_l.name: thuss
portrait_l.sjis: ウワサのアカバネをたおしたんだって すごいなぁ
portrait_l.ascii: So you defeated Red Wing Impressive!

portrait_l.name: thuss
portrait_l.sjis: それは娘もホれるわけだ
portrait_l.ascii: That must be why my daughter fell for you

info.sjis: ここから先は乙女の秘密 立ち入り禁止！！ ティエ
info.ascii: Past here is a maiden's secret No trespassing!! Tier

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.sjis: ここの娘はしっかり者じゃ
